perturbation.changed_text:
This Agreement is for a term (the "Term") of 12 months from the Effective Date on June 1st 2020 and expiring May 31st 2021.

(a) In the case that the company would not like to extend the terms of agreement for an additional month. The company must notify the consultant within 30 days of the conclusion of the 12 month term. Without notification the contract will automatically extend for an additional six months of service.
perturbation.explanation: The notification period for terminating the contract extension is changed from 5 days to 30 days, and the extension term is changed from one month to six months, creating a contradiction in the agreed-upon terms of termination and extension.

perturbation.original_text: Consultant shall indemnify, defend and hold harmless the Company, the Parent, and each of their members, their affiliates and their respective directors, officers, employees, representatives, agents, successors and assigns (collectively, "Indemnitees") from and against any and all claims, losses, liabilities, damages, costs, expenses (including, without limitation, attorneys fees and expenses) demands, fines, penalties, injunctions, suits and causes of action of any kind or nature whatsoever (collectively referred to as "Damages") instituted by any third party and arising out of Consultant's performance of services under this Consulting Agreement, unless said Damages arise out of the negligence or willful misconduct of the Company, its members, affiliates and their respective directors, officers, employees, representatives, agents, successors and assigns.
perturbation.changed_text: Consultant shall indemnify, defend and hold harmless the Company, the Parent, and each of their members, their affiliates and their respective directors, officers, employees, representatives, agents, successors and assigns (collectively, "Indemnitees") from and against any and all claims, losses, liabilities, damages, costs, expenses (including, without limitation, attorneys fees and expenses) demands, fines, penalties, injunctions, suits and causes of action of any kind or nature whatsoever (collectively referred to as "Damages") instituted by any third party and arising out of Consultant's performance of services under this Consulting Agreement. Even if said Damages arise out of the negligence or willful misconduct of the Company, its members, affiliates and their respective directors, officers, employees, representatives, agents, successors and assigns.
perturbation.explanation: The original text excepts damages arising from the negligence or willful misconduct of the Company from the indemnification obligation. The modified text removes this exception, making the Consultant responsible for indemnifying the Company even in cases where the Company's own negligence or willful misconduct caused the damages. This creates a direct conflict.

perturbation.original_text:
The Consultant agrees, to the extent reasonably require in the conduct of its business with the Company, to place at the disposal of the Company its judgment and experience and to provide business development services to the Company, including, but not limited to, the following:

a. Advise and assist the company in developing and implementing appropriate plans and materials for presenting the Company and its business plan, strategy and personnel to the financial community.

b. With the cooperation of the Company, maintain an awareness during the term of the agreement of the Company's plan's and strategy as it relates to the financial community.
perturbation.changed_text:
The Consultant agrees, to the extent reasonably require in the conduct of its business with the Company, to place at the disposal of the Company its judgment and experience and to provide business development services to the Company, including, but not limited to, the following:

a. Advise and assist the company in developing and implementing appropriate plans and materials for presenting the Company and its business plan, strategy and personnel to the financial community. The company is not obligated to take any of the advice.

b. Without any cooperation from the Company, maintain an awareness during the term of the agreement of the Company's plan's and strategy as it relates to the financial community.
perturbation.explanation: The original agreement states that the Consultant will advise the company in its plan and strategy. The modified text adds that the company is not obligated to follow the advice. Also, the original text requires cooperation from the Company, but the modified one changes that. This change removes any obligation for company cooperation, creating confusion about the consultant's role and responsibilities.
